quests.desc: You are now playing a life changing game of TextWorld! First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to make an attempt to move south. With that accomplished, head south. And then, move south. Following that, go to the west. That done, head north. Then, go west. After that, take a trip north. And then, venture east. That done, take the type U latchkey from the mantle. And then, make sure that the type U locker is locked with the type U latchkey. That's it!
commands: take type U latchkey from mantle
lock type U locker with type U latchkey
take type U latchkey from mantle
lock type U locker with type U latchkey

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the playroom. You begin looking for stuff.

 You make out a type U locker.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The type U locker contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The type U locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You scan the room for a mantle, and you find a mantle. The mantle is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the mantle you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a desk. [if there is something on the s_1]On the desk you can make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]However, the desk, like an empty desk, has nothing on it. Sometimes, just sometimes, TextWorld can just be the worst.[end if] You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a bench. The bench is usual.[if there is something on the s_2] On the bench you make out [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] The bench appears to be empty. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You are in a chamber. A normal kind of place.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You've entered a basement.

 [if c_1 is locked]A locked[else if c_1 is open]An open[otherwise]A closed[end if] trunk is in the corner.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a bedchamber. An usual kind of place. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'

 You can make out a American limited edition safe.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The American limited edition safe contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You see a suitcase.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] What a letdown! The suitcase is empty![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You've entered a kitchenette.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a cookhouse. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You've just shown up in a studio.

 Were you looking for a stand? Because look over there, it's a stand. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a stand, go to TextWorld. [if there is something on the s_3]On the stand you can see [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing is empty.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading west.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You are in an office. An ordinary kind of place.



 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] door leading east. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You are in a bedroom. A standard kind of place.

 You can make out a bed stand. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on. The bed stand is usual.[if there is something on the s_4] On the bed stand you can make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You arrive in a dish-pit. An usual one. The room is well lit.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
I am sorry to announce that you are now in the cellar. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You make out a TextWorld limited edition box.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The TextWorld limited edition box contains [a list of things in the c_4], so there's that.[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The TextWorld limited edition box is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a typical kind of place. That is to say, you're in a workshop.

 Look over there! a American safe.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The American safe contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] What a letdown! The American safe is empty![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a study.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cubicle. An usual one.

 You see a safe.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cookery. A standard kind of place.

 Oh, great. Here's a table. [if there is something on the s_5]You see [a list of things on the s_5] on the table. Suddenly, you bump your head on the ceiling, but it's not such a bad bump that it's going to prevent you from looking at objects and even things.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You are in an attic. A standard one.

 You see [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] soap scented box in the corner.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The soap scented box contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The soap scented box is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: serious studio
infos.desc:
You arrive in a studio. A serious one. Let's see what's in here.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the north.

infos.name: austere studio
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a studio. An austere one.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: silent office
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a silent office.

 You scan the room for a locker, and you find a locker.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] The locker is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a shelf. The shelf is usual.[if there is something on the s_6] On the shelf you can make out [a list of things on the s_6].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6] But the thing is empty.[end if] You see a chair. The chair is standard.[if there is something on the s_7] On the chair you can see [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
You've entered a lounge.

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a couch. The couch is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_8] On the couch you see [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

walkthrough: take type U latchkey from mantle
lock type U locker with type U latchkey

objective: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! First stop, move south. That done, attempt to venture south. That done, go to the south. Then, travel west. With that accomplished, move north. That done, make an attempt to take a trip west. And then, make an effort to venture north. After that, try to move east. And then, pick up the type U latchkey from the mantle. And then, Put the type U latchkey into the type U locker in the playroom to lock it. That's it!
